sections.title: Welcome to CPU Log Checker Pro
sections.subtitle: Streamline CPU Monitoring effortlessly
sections.name: hero-section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Discover a seamless solution for monitoring and managing high CPU usage with our easy-to-use file upload tool. Effortlessly check logs in /var/log for performance insights.

images.name: hero-image.png
images.description: A dynamic image illustrating tech systems and monitoring solutions.

sections.title: About CPU Log Checker Pro
sections.subtitle: Our Mission
sections.name: about-section
sections.label: About
sections.content: At CPU Log Checker Pro, we aim to provide developers and IT professionals with an intuitive platform to analyze CPU usage through log files easily. Our tool is designed to enhance efficiency and accuracy in system administration tasks.

images.name: about-background.jpg
images.description: Background image of a data center with glowing servers indicating our technological expertise.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.name: services-section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **File Upload & Analysis**: Upload log files for immediate analysis of CPU usage issues.  
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Monitor CPU logs dynamically to prevent overuse.  
- **Detailed Reporting**: Receive comprehensive reports to guide system optimizations.  
- **Custom Alerts**: Set up alerts for high CPU usage scenarios.  
- **Integration Capabilities**: Easily integrate with other log management systems.

sections.title: Get in Touch with Us
sections.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
sections.name: contact-section
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Reach out to our team for any inquiries or support needs. We are here to help make your CPU monitoring seamless.  

**Email**: support@cputoolpro.com

**Address**: 123 Tech Avenue, Silicon Valley, CA 94043
